fields.request: Validate Constellation UDP kickstart probe synchronization
fields.request_details: Start the celery beat + worker stack and confirm the 30-second Constellation probe task aligns its UDP transmissions to the shared UTC window. Watch the worker logs for the 'Constellation UDP probe window reached' message, then inspect tcpdump or wg show to ensure overlay peers receive packets simultaneously and handshakes occur for nodes with constellation IPs after enabling the constellation interface.
